name: WinAce Split Archive Part 10
summary: Part 10 of a spanned archive created by WinAce, a file compression and decompression program; stores a part of the overall archive, which contains a master .ACE file and subsequent ".c00," ".c01," ".c02," etc. files; used for storing and transferring large files in smaller parts.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
